game.name: A Long Survive
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Long Survive is a cooperative shooter in which you'll have to survive waves of enemies. Protect the nexus by fortifying your area with various structures and prepare for the siege. Upgrade your weapons, strategize with your teammates, or play as a solo warrior. Will you Survive?
